wordGroup: in haste 急忙地；草率的；慌张地
haste makes waste 欲速则不达
in hot haste 十万火急，急如星火

sentences.en: She made haste to open the door.
The letter had clearly been written in haste.
sentences.cn: 这封信明显是在匆忙中写的。

sentences.en: 'More haste, less speed' is a well-known paradox.
sentences.cn: “欲速则不达”是人们熟知的似非而是的隽语。
